mapper.select: select b.rolecode from s_user a,s_role b ,s_user_role c where a.username=#{username} and a.userid=c.userid and b.roleid=c.roleid and b.rolecode is not null

select * from ( select distinct d.permcode, d.url, d.permtype, nvl(d.iconcss,'fa-file-o') iconcss , d.permissionid,d.parentid, d.permname,d.sortnum from s_user a,s_role b ,s_user_role c,s_permission d ,s_role_permission e where a.username=#{username} and a.userid=c.userid and b.roleid=c.roleid and b.roleid=e.roleid and d.permissionid=e.permissionid and d.permcode is not null and d.parentid is not null and d.enabled='1' union select distinct c.permcode, c.url, c.permtype, nvl(c.iconcss,'fa-file-o') iconcss, c.permissionid, c.parentid, c.permname,c.sortnum from s_user a, s_user_permission b, s_permission c where a.username =#{username} and a.userid = b.userid and c.permissionid=b.permissionid and c.permcode is not null and c.parentid is not null and c.enabled='1' ) order by sortnum
